name: Tommy Hilfiger Purse
description:
Such a cutie! This great little purse really had me fooled - I thought it was leather for sure, but it's a seriously good faux leather! Perfect size, all stitching is also perfect. It is pre-owned and show a little wear on the handle, but still a solidly stylish addition to your fashion purse wardrobe! 

Tommy Hilfiger Designer bag in dark chocolate with a fabulous bright pink nylon liner. Completely clean, no stains, and with a handy zippered pocket inside. Love the flap with it's hidden magnetic closure! Fun sized at 10" wide x 6 1/2" tall with a 3 1/2" bottom width and a 7" handle drop. 

Sweet deal includes Free Shipping (to U.S. Address only).

name: Vintage Franco Sarto Leather Handbag
description:
What a sweet little leather bag! Perfect for when you want a lightweight but hardworking handbag - that can also be a shoulder bag. Pre-owned, in excellent condition! Plenty of room for your essentials and with a zippered inside pocket as well! This is a great date night bag, or perfect for weekend treasure hunting when you don't want to lug around a heavy bag and want your hands free to explore. 

Soft brown leather, all stitching strong & perfect, Lined with a sassy brown and black zebra stripe taffeta, easy access zipper also provides security, and it sports a silver Franco Sarto logo medallion on the side. Contoured leather strap has a gorgeous big nickel buckle (not adjustable, just a lovely adornment)
 
Bag is 9" wide x 5 1/2" tall x 3 1/2" bottom width and handles have a 10" drop.

name: Italian Metal Art Toleware Candleabra
description:
SOLD! A very unusual piece, marked Creative Co-op, but apparently an older item that is no longer available. 

Dark sage and brown metal art candleabra adapts to many decor styles ... use as a wonderful shabby chic, Paris Apartment, rustic farm house, Country French, or eclectic decoraing style. Gorgeous metal flowers and foliage adorn this tabletop accessory, which will hold five tapers. 

Very detailed and lovely with it's weathered patina and scrollwork designs, lush flowers and organic appeal. 

I've searched for similar candleabra's and cannot find any that come close to this beauty. Another lucky find at an estate sale. 

Shipping will be via USPS Parcel Post.  I have estimated the shipping. The package is not heavy, but is large. I will charge only actual shipping for this item. Please email for exact shipping charges from 30506 zip code. I will adjust shipping for any overage or create a separate PayPal invoice for extra expense prior to shipping as we agree upon. 

Thank you!
